props.name: className
props.docblock: The class name for the CardGrid component

props.name: columnSizes
props.docblock:
An object containing the desired column size at each breakpoint, following a similar
props API as ``react-bootstrap/Col``

description.text:
An object containing the desired column size at each breakpoint, following a similar
props API as ``react-bootstrap/Col``

props.name: actions
props.docblock:
Optional node to render on the top right of the card header,
 i.e. ActionRow or a DropdownMenu.
